title: The Other Hand - Love + Radio
description: A mentor to a disabled little boy loses a piece of himself and discovers what is gained.
itunes:title: The Other Hand - Love + Radio
itunes:subtitle: A mentor to a disabled little boy loses a piece of himself and discovers what is gained.  Sensitive listeners, please be advised - this story contains graphic content with descriptions of extreme bodily harm.  This story came to us from Nick van der Kolk
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and PRX
itunes:summary: A mentor to a disabled little boy loses a piece of himself and discovers what is gained.
content:encoded: A mentor to a disabled little boy loses a piece of himself and discovers what is gained.
